Trade/Device Name(s): Gold Standard Diagnostics Borrelia burgdorferi IgG ELISA Test Kit
Analyte(s): IgG antibodies to Borrelia burgdorferi (sensu stricto)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Gold Standard Diagnostics Borrelia burgdorferi IgG ELISA Test Kit for presumptive qualitative detection of IgG antibodies in human serum
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative presumptive (first step) test for detecting IgG antibodies to Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto in human serum from symptomatic patients or persons suspected of infection; positive/equivocal results require supplemental Western blot testing
